name: CrcTumourStageT
description: Lists the options for Colorectal cancer tumour stage T

concept.display: pT3: Tumour invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues (colon/rectum)
pT4a: Tumour directly invades other organs or structures (colon/rectum)

contains.display: pT3: Tumour invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues (colon/rectum)
pT4a: Tumour directly invades other organs or structures (colon/rectum)
TX Primary tumour cannot be assessed
T0 No evidence of primary tumour
Tis Carcinoma in situ: intraepithelial or invasion of lamina propria
